name: Pigeon Panic! AR
description:
The #1 Augmented Reality Pigeon game in the world.

Pigeon Panic is an utterly ridiculous arcade game, built to live out your very achievable fantasies of running haphazardly into large flocks of pigeons.

Scatter some food on the ground and watch as pigeons appear all around you… Ready… Set… Go!! Locate and run into each flock and score as many points as you can!

Note: No pigeons were harmed in the making of this game.
